article:

territorial qualification, so there were no Emperors or Despots 'of' Cyprus

House of Brienne, since 1490
:''This line of succession followed the primogeniture law of that existed in the
:Kingdoms of Cyrpus and Jerusalem, which was overruled by the Haute Cour.
